name: Typewriter (HedgeHog)
description:
This game is a fun adventure about time travel, being lost in time and trying to decide the fate of humanity. You are main character - Lucas, who receives a letter from an unknown individual. Time travelling begins!

The project was made for the game jam. 

I am very excited for this game, because it's my first text-based adventure. 

Hope you enjoy the experience and maybe get the message in the end. 

The game includes multiple ending, which allows you to play it many times. 

Good Luck!
